attributes.action: Withdraw Pres Trump's UK invitation unless human rights abuses cease immediately
attributes.additional_details:
This is not a call for a blanket ban on the state visit. 

This is a call for performing the UK's moral duty as a global superpower to hold its closest ally to account on shared values.

Useful links:

https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2018/jun/19/families-border-separations-trump-immigration-policy

https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-us-canada-44515123

https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-us-canada-44538110

https://www.nytimes.com/2018/06/18/us/politics/trump-immigration-germany-merkel.html
attributes.background:
President Trump is scheduled to make a state visit to the UK in mid Jul 2018.

The US govt's at the US-Mexico border of separating children and parents of migrant families are unconscionable, violate human rights, and not supported by any constitution, law or scripture.
